review: When I originally received the Chromecast I loved it. After having to move to a different apartment, I found out that it only works when you have a super strong internet connection. Since my move, I haven't really been able to us it. It keeps cutting out on the signal and having terrible picture quality.I am keeping the product because it would possibly work depending on what TV i choose to use it on, other than that I am kinda disappointed after seeing my sisters Amazon Fire Stick. That is worth the money, compared to this.One feature that was really cool was the the screen sharing you could do on a laptop through Google Chrome.
